function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unprecedented transmissibility and variety in symptoms of Covid-19","Impact":"High uncertainty and disruption of various industries and activities","Mitigation":"Investing in advanced healthcare systems and public health measures","Technologies":"Diagnostic testing technology, contact tracing apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers, business owners","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions, business associations"},{"Description":"Economic uncertainty and vulnerability to a second wave of infections","Impact":"Widespread economic hardship and business shutdowns","Mitigation":"Systemic changes in social and institutional arrangements, strengthening healthcare systems","Technologies":"Digital platforms for remote work, telemedicine, public health surveillance systems","People":"Businesses, individuals, healthcare workers","Owner":"Governments, healthcare institutions, business associations"},{"Description":"Little prospect of widely available vaccine and second global outbreak","Impact":"Immense uncertainty and risk of second wave of infections","Mitigation":"Investing in research for vaccine development and distribution, implementing public health protocols","Technologies":"Vaccine development and distribution technologies, public health surveillance and monitoring systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, researchers","Owner":"Governments, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"}]}
